value.title: Facebook’s new technique helps AI systems forget irrelevant information
value.excerpt: Facebook claims to have developed a technique that enables AI models to forget irrelevant information while retaining relevant data.

value.title: Artificial intelligence that can detect sarcasm in social media developed
value.excerpt: Sarcasm isn't always easy to identify in conversation, so you can imagine it's pretty challenging for a computer program to do it and do it well.

value.title: IBM's CEO says it's leaving consumer AI like facial recognition to other companies, as it doubles down on pitching Watson to businesses
value.excerpt: Dialing back its consumer AI ambitions, CEO Arvind Krishna said IBM is solely focused on business use cases like automating IT and customer service.

value.title: DJ Amazon, Facebook keep up their sizable spending on Washington lobbying during Q1
value.excerpt: Facebook Inc. continued to lead the so-called FAANG companies in spending on Washington lobbying during this year's first quarter with outlays of $4.80 million and $4.79 million, respectively, according to disclosures filed Tuesday.

value.title: Members of Google's ethical AI team reportedly complained about harassment and bias years before being fired
value.excerpt: Two of Google's most high-profile AI researchers reportedly raised concerns around bias, sexual harassment, and bullying before they were ousted.

value.title: AI algorithms can influence people's voting and dating decisions in experiments
value.excerpt: In a new series of experiments, artificial intelligence (A.I.) algorithms were able to influence people's preferences for fictitious political candidates or potential romantic partners, depending on whether recommendations were explicit or covert.

value.title: Facebook Employs AI Tech To Combat Complex Illnesses
value.excerpt: Facebook said it is rolling out artificial intelligence (AI) tools aimed at predicting the best combination of pharmaceuticals to combat complex illnesses.

value.title: Facebook claims AI can predict drug combinations to treat complex diseases
